scripts.build:chrome: ts-node manifest.json.make.ts chrome && esbuild --bundle --outdir=build/chrome/dist --target=es2024 --define:__BROWSER_TARGET__='"chrome"' src/background/main.ts src/content/main.ts src/offscreen/main.ts && yarn copy-assets:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: ts-node manifest.json.make.ts firefox && esbuild --bundle --outdir=build/firefox/dist --target=firefox115 --define:__BROWSER_TARGET__='"firefox"' src/background/main.ts src/content/main.ts && yarn copy-assets:firefox
scripts.copy-assets:chrome: cp icon-*.png icon.png icon.svg build/chrome/ && mkdir -p build/chrome/asset/offscreen && cp asset/offscreen/index.html build/chrome/asset/offscreen/
scripts.package: FORCE_COLOR=1 rm -rf build/ && yarn build && run-p --print-label --continue-on-error 'package:*'
scripts.watch: ts-node manifest.json.make.ts firefox && esbuild --bundle --watch --outdir=build/firefox/dist --target=firefox115 --sourcemap --define:__BROWSER_TARGET__='"firefox"' src/background/main.ts src/content/main.ts
